de.bitbrain.braingdx.input

Class GameInputAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • de.bitbrain.braingdx.input.GameInputAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class GameInputAdapter
extends com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
    An extension of the InputAdapter which adds additional capabilities required for a smooth game experience. It prevents input jitter and allows to use swiping and touching simultaneously.
    Since:
    0.3.5
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
